  1. from django.views.generic import ListView
  2. from django.views.generic.detail import SingleObjectMixin
  3. from django.views.generic.base import View
  4. from django.shortcuts import render_to_response
  5. from django.template import RequestContext
  6. from braces.views import JSONResponseMixin, LoginRequiredMixin
  8. from ftp_deploy.models import Log, Service
  11. class LogView(LoginRequiredMixin, ListView):
  13. """View for display logs"""
  15. model = Log
  16. context_object_name = 'logs'
  17. template_name = "ftp_deploy/log/log.html"
  18. paginate_by = 25
  20. def get_context_data(self, **kwargs):
  21. context = super(LogView, self).get_context_data(**kwargs)
  22. context['service_list'] = Service.objects.all().values('repo_name', 'pk')
  23. return context
  25. def post(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  26. logs = self.get_queryset()
  27. if self.request.POST['services']:
  28. logs = logs.filter(service__pk=self.request.POST['services'])
  30. if not int(self.request.POST['status']):
  31. logs = logs.filter(status=self.request.POST['status'])
  33. return render_to_response('ftp_deploy/log/list.html', locals(), context_instance=RequestContext(request))
  36. class LogSkipDeployView(LoginRequiredMixin, JSONResponseMixin, SingleObjectMixin, View):
  38. """View for skip fail logs"""
  40. model = Log
  42. def post(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  43. log = self.object
  44. log.skip = 1
  45. log.save()
  46. return self.render_json_response({'status': 'success'})
